mdx.excerpt: Pro-tip: cmd+shift+4 and then press the space-bar. Now, any window you click will be captured entirely against a transparent background :)

frontmatter.title: Pro-tip: cmd+shift+4 and then press the space-bar.
I bought a USB flash drive off of Ali Express, and it was fine. Here’s how you can check yours.
There are instructions on the English form itself.
